		addFilter (line 141)
	
 
	
	

Add a filter that will be applied before all log writers.


Before a message will be received by any of the writers, it  must be accepted by all filters added with this method.

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		void
		
			addFilter
		
					(Zend_Log_Filter_Interface $filter)

				Zend_Log_Filter_Interface
				$filter

		__call (line 85)
	
 
	
	

Undefined method handler allows a shortcut:


$log->levelName('message')      instead of    $log->log('message', Zend_Log::LEVELNAME)

	
    
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		void
		
			__call
		
					(string $method, string $params)
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				string
				$method: log level name			
    • 
					
  • 
				string
				$params: message to log
